ValidationRule.description: Day of generate date Must be 1 to 31 if Unit of Duration is 'Month'
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF(ISPICKVAL(Days_Month__c, "Month"), IF(ISBLANK(Day_of_the_month__c) , false, IF(AND(Day_of_the_month__c > 0, Day_of_the_month__c <= 31), false, true)) , false)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Day of generate date Must be 1 to 31 if Unit of Duration is 'Month'
